user.title: Configure device
user.description: Enter the requested information to integrate your Domintell installation with Home Assistant.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Domintell bridge

select_module.title: Configure device
select_module.description: We are unable to retrieve your bridge serial number. Enter the requested information to complete the integration.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Domintell bridge

discovery_confirm.title: Confirm
discovery_confirm.description: Do you want to set up the bridge ({serial}) at {host}?

reauth_confirm.title: Reauth
reauth_confirm.description: The Domintell integration needs to re-authenticate your account.

error.invalid_credentials: The username and/or password are invalid
error.max_connection: The maximum number of clients connected to the Domintell bridge has been reached
error.connection_refused: The device refused the connection. Make sure you entered the correct IP address or hostname. If your installation has a DNET module, enter the information of this one.
error.network_error: Device unreachable, make sure you have entered the correct IP address or hostname and that the device is available on your network.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network
abort.no_bridges: No Domintell bridge has been discovered.
abort.wrong_device: The configured device is not the same found on this host
abort.not_domintell_bridge: Not a Domintell bridge, discovered device did not match
abort.invalid_credentials: The username and/or password are invalid
abort.max_connection: The maximum number of clients connected to the Domintell bridge has been reached
abort.connection_refused: The device refused the connection. Make sure you entered the correct IP address or hostname. If your installation has a Master and a DNET, connect to the DNET.
abort.network_error: Device unreachable, make sure you have entered the correct IP address or hostname and that the device is available on your network.
